title: 1 br - Furnished Condo w/utilities Included
posting_body: Great for business travelers and etc for long term stays - 1 year lease.
1br / 1 ba - Amazing, Bright, and Spacious Top Floor Fully Furnished Condo near Cobb Galleria / Suntrust Park area.
New W/D included, A/C & Sunroom
- Fully stocked kitchen with hardwood floors throughout.
- Renovated Double Sink in the bathroom
- Assigned Parking
- Dedicated Office/Desk Area/Dinning Area
- Separate Living and Dining Room Area
- Smart TVs in Bedroom and Living Room
- All Common Household Appliances and Kitchen and Eating Utensils
- W/D in unit
Amenities Include: Fitness Center & pool
Nightlife:
SunTrust Park located less than a mile away.
There are countless entertainment opportunities like The Cobb Energy Center, Cobb Galleria, The Roxy Theatre, The Battery Atlanta, and endless nightlife all within a mile of your stay.
More info: This is a gated condo facility overlooking into the forest from the balcony view.
This one bedroom condo has a cozy spacious open floor plan and includes a relaxing patio and sun room ideal for enjoying a morning coffee, conference calls, and video chats.

Nearby: You’ll be amazed with beautiful clear waters at the Chattahoochee River Hiking Trails which is great for tubing and enjoy a sip at the Chattahoochee Coffee Company with unlimited wifi as well.
Small pets ok!
Move-in ready.
